aboutPage.title: We are Vaxal
aboutPage.intro: A team that believes AI should make work more meaningful. We don't chase tech trends, only focus on solving real business problems.
aboutPage.storyP1: Vaxal was born from a simple observation: most teams invest significant time and money in AI tools, yet see no substantial business improvement. The problem isn't the technology itself, but the lack of a bridge connecting tools to workflows.
aboutPage.storyP2: Our founding team comes from diverse backgrounds—enterprise IT, product development, design consulting—but we share a common experience: witnessing firsthand how organizations struggle between 'AI promises' and 'reality gaps.'
aboutPage.storyP3: So we created Vaxal—not another AI tool, but a pragmatic methodology and supporting toolset to help teams embrace AI the right way.
aboutPage.visionP1: Enable every organization to amplify human creativity and productivity with AI, while maintaining complete control over their workflows.
aboutPage.visionP2: We believe the best AI tools are 'invisible'—they blend into daily work, letting people focus on what truly matters, rather than spending time learning how to use tools.

caseStudyPage.title: Studio Doe: A Design Studio's AI Transformation Journey
caseStudyPage.challengeP1: Studio Doe is a 15-person brand design studio known for high-quality visual identity design. However, as the business grew, the founders found the team spending more time on administrative work—quotes, scheduling, meeting notes, progress tracking—rather than actual design work.
caseStudyPage.challengeP2: They tried various tools, but fragmented solutions only increased communication costs. Designers needed to switch between 5-6 different applications, with information scattered everywhere.
caseStudyPage.solutionIntro: We partnered with Studio Doe to redesign their workflow using Vaxal's product suite. The focus wasn't replacing existing tools, but using AI to connect them, automate repetitive tasks, and provide a unified information access point.
caseStudyPage.testimonial: Vaxal transformed how we work. Now designers can focus on design, not administrative tasks. More importantly, all information is in one place—nothing gets lost anymore.

rykoPage.title: The Operating System for Enterprise Intelligence
rykoPage.subtitle: Ryko is not just an AI model container—it's the core runtime connecting enterprise data with LLMs. Supporting MCP protocol, skill mounting, and multi-modal interaction, letting AI understand your business language.
rykoPage.assertionText: Most AI applications are still stuck at the chatbot stage, unable to access core enterprise data. Ryko breaks down this wall. It's a standardized runtime that enables LLMs to safely read and write enterprise APIs through tools, transforming AI from 'consultant' to 'team member.'
rykoPage.capabilitiesSubtitle: Three pillars of enterprise AI runtime
rykoPage.cap1Desc: Full support for Model Context Protocol (MCP). Write your internal tools once, and any Ryko-powered model can invoke them. Standardized interfaces for precise enterprise resource orchestration.
rykoPage.cap2Desc: Not locked to any single model. Ryko allows you to freely switch between GPT-4, Claude, or Llama. Choose the most suitable model based on task complexity, balancing cost and performance.
rykoPage.cap3Desc: For sensitive data, Ryko supports fully air-gapped deployment. Combined with local models, ensuring data stays within your data center, meeting the strictest security standards.

brevflowPage.title: AI-Native Automation Engine
brevflowPage.subtitle: BrevFlow lets you build cross-system workflows with an intuitive visual interface. From simple notifications to complex approval processes, transform repetitive labor into AI-powered automation pipelines.
brevflowPage.assertionText: Too much work in enterprises is copy-paste repetition. BrevFlow lets you define a process once, and AI handles the execution. Breaking platform boundaries, automating complex business logic into efficient, reliable workflows.
brevflowPage.cap1Desc: Drag-and-drop interface for workflow design. Build complex conditionals, loops, and branching logic without writing code.
brevflowPage.cap2Desc: One-click connection to Slack, Notion, Google Workspace, custom APIs, and hundreds of services. Data flows freely between systems.
brevflowPage.cap3Desc: Embed AI judgment in workflow nodes. Let AI automatically choose next steps based on context, not just fixed rules.

formaldocPage.title: AI Production Line for Professional Documents
formaldocPage.subtitle: FormalDoc transforms enterprise standards into AI templates, automatically generating precise, professional business documents. From templates to finished products, maintaining brand consistency.
formaldocPage.assertionTitle: Documents Are No Longer a Bottleneck
formaldocPage.assertionText: Quotes, contracts, reports—these documents consume massive time yet often have inconsistent formats. FormalDoc lets AI understand your format standards, generating standard-compliant professional documents with one click.
formaldocPage.cap1Desc: Upload existing documents, AI automatically learns format, terminology, and structure to build enterprise-specific templates.
formaldocPage.cap2Desc: Automatically pull data from CRM, ERP, or any data source. Ensuring content is timely and accurate.
formaldocPage.cap3Desc: Support Word, PDF, HTML, and more output formats. Automatically convert and apply styles based on requirements.

soloistboardPage.title: Command Center for AI Projects
soloistboardPage.subtitle: SoloistBoard provides project-level AI usage monitoring and governance tools. Ensuring every AI decision is traceable, explainable, and compliant with organizational policies.
soloistboardPage.assertionText: When AI starts executing critical tasks, monitoring and traceability become crucial. SoloistBoard gives you visibility into all AI behaviors, ensuring compliance and control.
soloistboardPage.cap1Desc: Record every AI call, decision basis, and output result. Complete audit trail meeting compliance requirements.
soloistboardPage.cap2Desc: Real-time monitoring of token usage, cost allocation, and performance metrics. Optimize AI investment returns.
soloistboardPage.cap3Desc: Set organization-level AI usage policies. Automatically block non-compliant requests, protecting sensitive data.
